newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha firmer as crude rallies.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha firmer as crude rallies.

text.p: NWE naphtha was firmer on Thursday as crude oil staged a further rally, traders said.
Swaps rose through the day and September was talked at around $194 cif NWE by the day's end.

A U.K. refiner was heard having bought a Russian Dow quality cargo late on Wednesday at $196 cif NWE. Other Russians are available but traders' assessments of quantities varied widely. These cargoes have depressed the value of full-range naphtha.
A refiner in the U.K. sold an n+a cargo on Wednesday at a $2 premium to the quoted cif high, cif NWE.
